case_title: Messrs ZAIN ENTERPRISES, KARACHI and another vs DIRECTOR, DIRECTORATE GENERAL OF VALUATION and 2 others
case_number: Customs Appeals Nos, K-1603 and K-1604 of 2014
appellant: Messrs ZAIN ENTERPRISES, KARACHI and another
respondent: DIRECTOR, DIRECTORATE GENERAL OF VALUATION and 2 others

key_points.tribunal_decision: Declared valuation ruling and assessment orders ab initio void

issues: Failure to adhere to Section 24A of the General Clauses Act, 1897
Assessment based on void valuation ruling
Delay in passing order beyond statutory limits

final_decision.assessment_orders: Declared illegal, ab initio, and void
